ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Is this list still alive?
ygData.msgSnippet: Btw, DAOC is having big patch almost everyday now.  Based on the feedback on beta testers and test leaders, I can see that they are doing pretty well so far.
ygData.messageBody:
Btw, DAOC is having big patch almost everyday now. Based on the feedback
on beta testers and test leaders, I can see that they are doing pretty well
so far. Of coz after AO Launching Crisis, no one dare to say Mythics's
launching will be smoother. Let pray hard that it won't be as bad as AO
(can't imagine anything worse liao, hehe).

This list is not setup by me, how to close? :P Come to sg-mmorpg forum to
talk lor. :)

On 27 September, 2001 7:02 PM, Andrew Lam [SMTP:draco@...]
wrote:
> I dunno, i do agree that Furor is somewhat overexaggerating. But if you
look
> at AO just prerelease, there were people complaining about the problems
with
> its fundamentals which were shot down by the fanbois then. This just
appear
> to me to be the same thing happening all over again.
>
> All i can say is, even if there are problems, even fundamental ones, they
> can be fixed, but only within a certain time window (witness the AO 12.6
> decable for a good example of exceeding that time window). Only time will
> tell.
>
> And this list does seem very dead. Ziltus you should consider just
closing
> it down :D
>

surprised
